name: Bookmarklets
body: # bookmarklets Some useful Bookmarlets Mostly tested on chrome, easier to user and develop then creating full fledged chrome extensions! nxt.js ------ Scrolls the next image into view, at the end optionally moves to next page For Next Drag arrow to bookmark bar ► For Previous Drag arrow to bookmark bar ◀ ydel.js ------- To delete yahoo email, I have to take three actions, 1. select all 2. delete 3. confirm on modal box This automates that.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
